title: Curve Men Cologne Spray, 4.2-Ounce
description: Curve For Men is freshly masculine. It is a cool, sensuous scent that is also edgy and complex. Green leaf and Douglas fir combine with cactus, amber, and wood to create an exhilarating freshness. The packaging is innovative: bottles are packaged in metallic tins in muted colors of citrine and amber.

title: Perry Ellis 360 White By Perry Ellis For Men. Eau De Toilette Spray 3.4 Ounces
description: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Lapidus By Ted Lapidus For Men. Eau De Toilette Spray 3.3 Ounces
description: Introduced in 1987. Fragrance notes: rich spices, woods and lavender. Recommended use: romantic.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
